title: Hearts
description: To save herself, Rose must work with a dangerous, mysterious ally Night, who might just be her greatest threat.Rose only ever wanted a quiet life as a blacksmith in the small village of Crooked Grove. But all that changes when the rebels attack the small Hearts village and she's thrown down the well. Only, the well opens up to the Three Sisters and leads her to the Hatterthon--a deadly game of murder and survival.If Rose ever wants to make it out alive, she must be more brutal than any other player. Keep calm, collected and cool. That's her rule. But Night, the mysterious player she's allied with, threatens all she knows with his dangerous smiles and even deadlier eyes.In the Hatterthon, everyone is a little mad...And the only way out is to win. By any means necessary.HEARTS is a Wonderland retelling, hold the Alice! Set in a mediaval Wonderland, this series welcomes old favourites with a dark twist to a beloved story.Previously published as Hearts, first edition.
author: Klarissa King
